weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm often seen in winter.
🧤 You can make snowballs with me.
⛄ You can build a friend with me.

weather.question: I make the trees dance and the kites fly high. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I'm all around you, but you can't see me.
💨 I can be gentle or strong.
⛵ Boats use me to move.

weather.question: I'm big and bright and yellow. I keep you warm all day long. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I only come out during the day.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. You need an umbrella when I'm around. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Puddles appear when I fall.
☔ You wear a raincoat to keep dry from me.
🌱 Plants love to drink me.

weather.question: I'm a big white fluffy thing that floats in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I sometimes look like sheep.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
🌧️ I can bring rain.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I'm full of colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I'm shaped like an arc.
🔴 I have red, yellow, and blue in me.
🌦️ You see me when the sun comes out after rain.

weather.question: I'm very cold, and I can turn water into a solid. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I can freeze things.
🧊 Ice cubes are made of me.
❄️ Winter brings a lot of me.

weather.question: I'm a loud noise in the sky, and I come with lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I often happen during a storm.
🌩️ You can be scared of me.
👂 Sometimes, it sounds like a rumble.

weather.question: I am a season where leaves change color and fall from the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 Pumpkins and apples are popular during me.
🍂 The weather gets cooler during me.
🧥 You might need a jacket during me.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky.  I can be very small or quite big. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of ice.
🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I hit you.
⛈️ I often fall during thunderstorms.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats can float on me.
🏖️ You can find me near the beach.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I'm slow and steady.
🐚 I live in the ocean.
🚶 You can find me on the beach

ocean.question: I am big and gray, and I sing a song. I spout water from my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am a mammal.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
💨 I breathe air.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms.
💦 I can change my color.
🧱 I can squeeze into tight places.

ocean.question: I am colorful and have many legs. I live in the ocean but I am not a fish. What am I?

hints.text: 🦞 Some people eat me.
🖐️ I have claws.
🧱 I live on the sea bed.

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and swim very fast. I am a type of fish. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I'm a predator.
🦷 I have sharp teeth.
🔪 I'm sometimes known as a hunter

ocean.question: I'm a home for many fish, colorful and bright. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ Many creatures live here.
🌳 I am made of tiny animals.
🧱 Divers often come to visit me.

ocean.question: I float on the ocean and carry people from one land to another. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 I am very big.
🌊 I travel on water.
🌍 I can take you to other countries.

ocean.question: I'm a treasure found deep in the ocean, shiny and round. What am I?

hints.text: 🦪 I grow inside a shell.
💍 Sometimes used to make jewelry.
💎 A pirate might be looking for me.

ocean.question: I am a very strong current that moves in the ocean like a river. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I help regulate the temperature of the Earth.
💨 I am affected by wind and the Earth's rotation.
➡️ I can be warm or cold.
